doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: 1854-1863; alteration: mid 19th century; alteration: 1867; alteration: 1870-1871; alteration: 1888; alteration: 1906-1909; alteration: 1986

2 Story Brick, Tetrastyle Portico, Fluted Columns with Stop Fluting, Balcony, Lunette in Tympanum, 5 Bay, Hipped Roof, Widows Walk, Fanlight, Triangular Lintels, 6/6, 9/9, Bay Window, Blinds, Porte Cochere Carriage House: 7 Course American Bond, Diocletian Therm, part of dorm usedDormitory:2 Tier Porch, 1st Floor 6 Course American with Flemish Bond, 2nd Floor 7 Course American Bond, 6/6, BlindsBuckingham Palace:See UVA
George Sidney Ford, dorms--Stanford White, Arch, then by William Kendall & William Richardson of that firm
survey data: Virginia Road Traces--Charlottesville's Historic Landmarks Study Surveys
Mrs Sidney S Carr Boarding House--Blue Cottage burned --Dorms--Dining Hall --Breakfast Room
